originalText.text: Worked for company for many years. I've  seen how they treat the tenants from the inside. All I can say STAY AWAY!!....all they care about is money. The amount of the money people paying to stay at their building to services they get is simply a joke!

originalText.text: Been a tenant in a Weinreb Management building for the past six years. Great team and quick turnaround on repair requests. Best landlord I've had in New York.

text.text: Been a tenant in a Weinreb Management building for the past six years. Great team and quick turnaround on repair requests. Best landlord I've had in New York.

originalText.text: They are the worst, I live on Ocean Pkwy in one of their building. Never fixes anything properly in the building. The heat doesn’t work properly in the winter. I’ve complained several times and also mentioned that we have a kid in apartment who got sick cause of cold. They never really cared. It takes 5 calls and 10 text messages to supper to fix something. But the heater situation never fixed. I hope by the reading this review they will do something about it before I need to make a call to the city.

originalText.text:
Good management (excellent by NYC standards).
Pros:
- application process was straightforward and relatively quick
- management was pretty flexible on lease terms, pets, etc.; you just have to ask them nicely
- got my deposit back in full: it was mailed to me right after my move out date (this is actually important, since I heard people in NYC often don't get their deposit back for no reason, and if they do, they may have to wait for it for a few months...)
- building I lived in was well maintained
- in my building we had very good and responsive superintendent and maintenance team
- apartment prices are fair with very small rent increase

Cons:
- to apply for an apartment you need to go though Rachel Realty; they are better than many agencies in NYC, but if you come from out-of-state, don't expect much
- in my building elevators were just acceptable, even by NYC standards... take the stairs!
- move-in/move-out 9a-5p weekdays ONLY

originalText.text: Terrible Management. Never fixes your issues on time. The building appartments falling apart. If you contact the management they will tell you to get back to you but never gives you call back. All the water pipes in the building messed up its been leaking for a year. The landlord doesnt care about anything. Its time to report you guys. I have called from 514 ocean parkway many times never got any calls back.
